meanings.sent1: She overcleans her room every day, making it sparkle.
meanings.sent2: He tends to overcleans the dishes, scrubbing them until they shine.
meanings.sent3: The robot overcleans the house, even vacuuming the same spot multiple times.
meanings.sent4: Her obsession with cleanliness causes her to overcleans, as if dirt is her enemy.
meanings.sent5: The idea of overcleansing the entire neighborhood is absurd and unnecessary.

meanings.definition: To clean beyond what is necessary or recommended.
meanings.sent1: The maid always overcleans the hotel rooms, leaving them spotless.
meanings.sent2: He tends to overcleans his car, washing it every day.
meanings.sent3: She overcleans the kitchen, even wiping the counters multiple times a day.
meanings.sent4: His perfectionism leads him to overcleans his workspace, organizing everything meticulously.
meanings.sent5: The idea of overcleansing the garden seems excessive and wasteful.
